Enrique parted ways with the former World Champions on Thursday, a day after their Round of 16 loss to Morocco on Tuesday.
The Spain football federation went on to name the country's U-21 team coach, Luis de la Fuente, as the replacement for the former Barcelona tactician.

The RFEF would like to thank Luis Enrique and his entire coaching staff for the work done in the last few years."
